ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Hell is the promised meeting-place for all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For whom the ordained place is surely Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely Hell is the promised place for all of them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Hell is the promised place for them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed hell is the promise for all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And surely, Hell is the place promised for them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely Hell is the promised place of them all:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: being perverse; Gehenna shall be their promised land all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! for all such, hell will be the promised place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, Hell is the place to which they are destined,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily Hell is the place promised unto them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed hell is the tryst of them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily, Hell is the promised abode for them all!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And surely, Hell is the promised place for them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Gehenna (Hell) will be the promise for all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Hell is the meeting-place for them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:43] And truly Hell shall be their tryst, all of them, that is, all those who follow you, shall be with you [in Hell].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! for all such, hell will be the promised place) the destination of those who obey you.
